about_the_game:
A new costume for Eren is added.
A male school uniform and academic cap. Enjoy battles and daily life sections in new fashion.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mod"" on the main menu, and then select Eren.
Change into the costume "Bad Boy Outfit" by selecting "Character Editor" when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Eren in the Daily Life section.
Change into the costume "Bad Boy Outfit" by selecting "Change outfit" when you are near Eren.
